ps2.2:1.5: ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ anaññathametaṁ, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ anaññathametaṁ, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ anaññathametaṁ.
ps2.2:1.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni”.
ps2.2:2.2: Cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:2.4: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:3.2: Cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:3.4: ime cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:4.2: Cattāro nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:4.4: ime cattāro nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:5.2: Cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:5.4: ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
ps2.2:7.3: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—
ps2.2:7.4: imehi catūhākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:8.3: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho anattaṭṭho—
ps2.2:8.4: imehi catūhākārehi anattaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:9.3: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho saccaṭṭho—
ps2.2:9.4: imehi catūhākārehi saccaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:10.3: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho—
ps2.2:10.4: imehi catūhākārehi paṭivedhaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni yaṁ ekasaṅgahitaṁ taṁ ekattaṁ.
ps2.2:11.2: Yaṁ aniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ dukkhaṁ taṁ aniccaṁ, yaṁ aniccañca dukkhañca taṁ anattā.
ps2.2:11.3: Yaṁ aniccañca dukkhañca anattā ca taṁ tathaṁ.
ps2.2:11.4: Yaṁ aniccaṁ ca dukkhañca anattā ca tathañca taṁ saccaṁ.
ps2.2:11.5: Yaṁ aniccañca dukkhañca anattā ca tathañca saccañca taṁ ekasaṅgahitaṁ.
ps2.2:12.3: Tathaṭṭhena, anattaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhena, paṭivedhaṭṭhena, abhiññaṭṭhena, pariññaṭṭhena, pahānaṭṭhena, bhāvanaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena—
ps2.2:13.3: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, pariññāya pariññaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, pahānassa pahānaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—
ps2.2:13.4: imehi navahākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:14.5: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, pariññāya pariññaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, pahānassa pahānaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho—
ps2.2:14.6: imehi navahākārehi paṭivedhaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:15.3: Tathaṭṭhena, anattaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhena, paṭivedhaṭṭhena, abhijānanaṭṭhena, parijānanaṭṭhena, dhammaṭṭhena, tathaṭṭhena, ñātaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena, phassanaṭṭhena, abhisamayaṭṭhena—
ps2.2:15.4: imehi dvādasahi ākārehi cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:16.3: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho;
ps2.2:16.4: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṁyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho;
ps2.2:16.5: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho tathaṭṭho;
ps2.2:16.6: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—
ps2.2:16.7: imehi soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:17.12: Soḷasahi ākārehi abhisamayaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedhāni.
ps2.2:17.13: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;
ps2.2:17.14: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṁyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;
ps2.2:17.15: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;
ps2.2:17.16: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho—
ps2.2:17.17: imehi soḷasahi ākārehi abhisamayaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
ps2.2:19.3: Saṅkhatānaṁ saccānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitānaṁ aññathattaṁ paññāyati asaṅkhatassa saccassa na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati—
ps2.2:20.3: Dukkhasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati;
ps2.2:20.4: samudayasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati;
ps2.2:20.5: maggasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati;
ps2.2:20.6: nirodhasaccassa na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati—
ps2.2:21.1: Catunnaṁ saccānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā?
ps2.2:21.2: Samudayasaccaṁ akusalaṁ, maggasaccaṁ kusalaṁ, nirodhasaccaṁ abyākataṁ.
ps2.2:21.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
ps2.2:22.1: Siyā tīṇi saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ tīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ?
ps2.2:22.5: evaṁ akusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.
ps2.2:22.7: evaṁ kusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.
ps2.2:22.9: evaṁ abyākataṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.
ps2.2:22.10: Evaṁ siyā tīṇi saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ tīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ vatthuvasena pariyāyenāti.
ps2.2:23.1: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi—
ps2.2:23.2: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
ps2.2:23.3: ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
ps2.2:23.4: ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
ps2.2:23.5: ko saṅkhārānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
ps2.2:23.6: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
ps2.2:23.8: ‘yaṁ kho rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
ps2.2:23.10: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—
ps2.2:23.17: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
ps2.2:23.19: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—
ps2.2:24.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ, neva tāvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ yato ca khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
ps2.2:25.1: Yaṁ rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādoti—
ps2.2:25.3: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa ādīnavoti—
ps2.2:25.5: Yo rūpasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇanti—
ps2.2:25.7: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi—
ps2.2:26.4: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa assādoti—
ps2.2:26.6: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavoti—
ps2.2:26.8: Yo viññāṇasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇanti—
ps2.2:26.10: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi—
ps2.2:27.8: Jarāmaraṇañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇasamudayañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇanirodhañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:28.5: Jātiñca pajānāti, jātisamudayañca pajānāti, jātinirodhañca pajānāti, jātinirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:29.5: Bhavaṁ ca pajānāti, bhavasamudayañca pajānāti, bhavanirodhañca pajānāti, bhavanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:30.5: Upādānañca pajānāti, upādānasamudayañca pajānāti, upādānanirodhañca pajānāti upādānanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:31.5: Taṇhañca pajānāti, taṇhāsamudayañca pajānāti, taṇhānirodhañca pajānāti, taṇhānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:32.5: Vedanañca pajānāti, vedanāsamudayañca pajānāti, vedanānirodhañca pajānāti, vedanānirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:33.5: Phassañca pajānāti, phassasamudayañca pajānāti, phassanirodhañca pajānāti, phassanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:34.5: Saḷāyatanañca pajānāti, saḷāyatanasamudayañca pajānāti, saḷāyatananirodhañca pajānāti, saḷāyatananirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:35.5: Nāmarūpañca pajānāti, nāmarūpasamudayañca pajānāti, nāmarūpanirodhañca pajānāti, nāmarūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:36.5: Viññāṇañca pajānāti, viññāṇasamudayañca pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhañca pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:37.5: Saṅkhāre ca pajānāti, saṅkhārasamudayañca pajānāti, saṅkhāranirodhañca pajānāti, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadañca pajānāti—
ps2.2:38.1: Jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, jāti samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.2: Jāti dukkhasaccaṁ, bhavo samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.3: Bhavo dukkhasaccaṁ, upādānaṁ samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.4: Upādānaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, taṇhā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.5: Taṇhā dukkhasaccaṁ, vedanā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.6: Vedanā dukkhasaccaṁ, phasso samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.7: Phasso dukkhasaccaṁ, saḷāyatanaṁ samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.8: Saḷāyatanaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, nāmarūpaṁ samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.9: Nāmarūpaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, viññāṇaṁ samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.10: Viññāṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, saṅkhārā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:38.11: Saṅkhārā dukkhasaccaṁ, avijjā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:39.1: Jarāmaraṇaṁ siyā dukkhasaccaṁ, siyā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṁ.
ps2.2:39.3: bhavo siyā dukkhasaccaṁ, siyā samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccanti.
